mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upms_user_access_log( log_id, log_title, app_module, request_uri, http_method, mvc_method, request_header, request_content_type, request_content, access_user_id, access_time, client_ip_addr, server_ip_addr, process_time, logging_completed, async_request, response_content_type, app_id, create_time, response_content ) VALUES ( #{logId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appModule, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUri, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{httpMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mvcMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestHeader, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestContentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accessTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientIpAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverIpAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loggingCompleted, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{asyncRequest, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{responseContentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseContent, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM upms_user_access_log WHERE log_id = #{logId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.log_id logId, a.log_title logTitle, a.app_module appModule, a.request_uri requestUri, a.http_method httpMethod, a.mvc_method mvcMethod, a.request_header requestHeader, a.request_content_type requestContentType, a.request_content requestContent, a.access_user_id accessUserId, DATE_FORMAT(a.access_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') accessTime, a.client_ip_addr clientIpAddr, a.server_ip_addr serverIpAddr, a.process_time processTime, a.logging_completed loggingCompleted, a.async_request asyncRequest, a.response_content_type responseContentType, a.app_id appId, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.response_content responseContent FROM upms_user_access_log a WHERE a.log_id = #{logId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.log_id logId, a.log_title logTitle, a.app_module appModule, a.request_uri requestUri, a.http_method httpMethod, a.mvc_method mvcMethod, a.request_header requestHeader, a.request_content_type requestContentType, a.request_content requestContent, a.access_user_id accessUserId, DATE_FORMAT(a.access_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') accessTime, a.client_ip_addr clientIpAddr, a.server_ip_addr serverIpAddr, a.process_time processTime, a.logging_completed loggingCompleted, a.async_request asyncRequest, a.response_content_type responseContentType, a.app_id appId, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, a.response_content responseContent FROM upms_user_access_log a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.log_id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM upms_user_access_log a WHERE 1=1
